tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_inventory_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id UUID REFERENCES virtual_inventory_items(item_id),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  item_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES virtual_inventory_item(id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE VirtualInventory (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity INT,
    last_updated timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_date timestamp,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES VirtualInventory(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    order_date timestamp,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ShippingDetails (
    order_id INT,
    shipping_address VARCHAR(255),
    shipping_date timestamp,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES Orders(order_id)
);
